SELECT sr.id, --服务申请管理ID sr.prescription_no, --处方号 e.bus_no as encounterBusNo, --就诊号 pt.name AS patientName, --病人姓名 pt.bus_no AS patientBusNo, --病人ID（前台显示用） sr.patient_id, --病人ID ad.name AS medicationInformation, --药品信息 md.bus_no || ' ' || md.name || ' 规格：' || COALESCE(m.total_volume, '') AS medicationDetail,--药品 m.lot_number AS medicationLotNumber, --药品批次号 mr.status_enum AS medicationStatusEnum, --药品状态 sr.performer_id, --执行护士 sr.performer_check_id,--核对人 to_char(sr.occurrence_start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS occurrenceStartTime, --预计执行时间 to_char(sr.occurrence_end_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS occurrenceEndTime, --预计结束时间 ai.clinical_status_enum, --皮试结果 ai.verification_status_enum, --皮试检查项目状态 mr.practitioner_id as doctorId, --开单医生 ai.note --备注 FROM wor_service_request sr LEFT JOIN adm_encounter e ON e.id = sr.encounter_id LEFT JOIN adm_patient pt ON pt.id = sr.patient_id LEFT JOIN wor_activity_definition ad ON ad.id = sr.activity_id LEFT JOIN med_medication_request mr ON mr.prescription_no = sr.prescription_no LEFT JOIN med_medication m ON m.id = mr.medication_id LEFT JOIN med_medication_definition md ON md.id = m.medication_def_id LEFT JOIN cli_allergy_intolerance ai ON ai.request_id = sr.id
ad.bus_no = 'ps001' -- 皮试检查的编号，todo：编号未定，后期修改 AND mr.skin_test_flag = 1 AND md.skin_test_flag = 1 AND sr.status_enum in (2,3,6) --服务状态有效
AND e.bus_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{OutpatientSkinTestRecordSearchParam.encounterBusNo}, '%')
AND pt.bus_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{OutpatientSkinTestRecordSearchParam.patientBusNo}, '%')
AND sr.prescription_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{OutpatientSkinTestRecordSearchParam.prescriptionNo}, '%')
AND pt.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{OutpatientSkinTestRecordSearchParam.phone}, '%')
AND ai.recorded_date BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{OutpatientSkinTestRecordSearchParam.beginTime} || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{OutpatientSkinTestRecordSearchParam.endTime} || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND ai.verification_status_enum = #{OutpatientSkinTestRecordSearchParam.status}
ORDER BY sr.prescription_no,e.bus_no,md.bus_no LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
